scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel src/*.html --out-dir dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build --no-source-maps src/*.html --out-dir build/ --public-url . --no-minify
scripts.deploy-test: cp -r .circleci build && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: Test" -t
scripts.deploy-ghpages: cp -r .circleci build && gh-pages -d build -m "Automated deployment to GitHub Pages: ${CIRCLE_SHA1}" -t
